LanguageData.ImmersiveOrbitalTraders.Settings.AllowTr: Trader caravans already have visible pawns on the map and in trade context. Enabling portraits for caravans may mismatch the shown character and break immersion.
LanguageData.ImmersiveOrbitalTraders.Settings.UseRand: Generates a random pawn from the trader faction and uses that pawn portrait texture instead of the static character portrait.
